refnamediv.refpurpose: Create file with unique file name

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
dir
The directory where the temporary filename will be created.
prefix
The prefix of the generated temporary filename.
Only the first 63 characters of the prefix are used. Windows even uses only the first three characters of the prefix.

&reftitle.notes;
If PHP cannot create a file in the specified dir parameter, it falls back on the system default. On NTFS this also happens if the specified dir contains more than 65534 files.
